details.description:
Learning node

The Fondazione Bruno Kessler’s Center for Information and Communication Technology (FBK-ICT Center), founded in the second half of 1980s, is an international research center that focuses on high quality research of Information Technology, in order to provide a practical and experimental evidence of its added value for the market, cultural growth, and social welfare.

FBK-ICT IRST aims to develop ICT for improving the quality of life, by advancing ICT focused on the individual.

These goals position FBK ICT - IRST in the international scientific arena as a unique institution, which differs from universities, primarily devoted to theoretical speculation, as well as from applied research centers, primarily devoted to technology transfer.

To learn more about ODI Trento visit their website.
